ISSUE.TITLE: Microdata is incorrectly set to OutOfStock for grouped product
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 All our products are grouped products with two child variants, sample and main product. If I set the variants to "Don't track inventory," all the microdata for the entire product is set to: `<meta itemprop="availability" content="http://schema.org/OutOfStock">` All that in a nutshell, if we're not tracking any inventory, shouldn't all the microdata always be set to "InStock?" Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/92162/microdata-incorrectly-outofstock-on-grouped-product-with-dont-track-inventory See also #5116 So, product availability should be always `InStock` when ManageInventoryMethod is `DontManageStock`.
